sentences.sentence: Current global solar-power production is 10 gigawatts.
sentences.translation: 现在的全球太阳能生产能力是10千兆瓦。

sentences.sentence: Last year, manufacturers made 5 gigawatts of photovoltaic panels.
sentences.translation: 去年，生产商们共制造了发电量达50亿瓦特的光电池板。

sentences.sentence: Capacity in America jumped by 45% last year to reach nearly 17 gigawatts (GW).
sentences.translation: 去年，美国的风电产能上升了45%，达到近17吉瓦。
